issue.title: www.twitch.tv

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

issue.title: volces.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS, AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.19.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Microsoft Edge

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

prod-chat-kimi.tos-s3-cn-beijing.volces.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

The domain name related to the request to upload to volces.com has been banned
1. Visit the website https://kimi.moonshot.cn/ When using the adguard DNS interception function, there may be a resolution failure, which can be stably replicated on the Windows client
2. An abnormal resolution occurred while attempting to analyze the nslookup volces.com related domain name, with a response of 0.0.0.0 being an invalid address
3. Attempted to check the adguard DNS filter rules and found that | | * volces.com has banned the entire domain https://adguard.com/kb/zh-CN/general/ad-filtering/adguard-filters/
Appeal:
This upload action is a legal action. The scope of the volces.com domain name ban is too large and volces.com does not provide services. Can the ban on volces.com be lifted and individual third or fourth level domain names that violate regulations be banned


![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/106b9c42-9dad-48f2-b166-38bd80d0de04)

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/4ae22d31-49a5-4fc0-a4f0-f0a79cb43818)



### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition
